SEARCH
Package com.example.eventlottery.managers

Class ImageManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventlottery.managers.ImageManager
public class ImageManager extends Object
Singleton manager for handling all image operations: - Compress and encode images - Store image data in Firestore - Retrieve images for events - Delete images from Firestore

    • getInstance

      public static ImageManager getInstance()

    • uploadImage

      public void uploadImage(android.content.Context context, String eventId, android.net.Uri imageUri, String organizerName, ImageManager.ImageUploadCallback callback)
      Upload an image for an event (compresses and stores in Firestore)
      Parameters:
      context - Application context for image compression
      eventId - The event ID this image belongs to
      imageUri - The URI of the image to upload
      organizerName - The name of the organizer uploading the image
      callback - Callback with the uploaded Image object or error

    • performUpload

      private void performUpload(android.content.Context context, String eventId, android.net.Uri imageUri, String userId, String organizerName, ImageManager.ImageUploadCallback callback)

    • getImagesForEvent

      public void getImagesForEvent(String eventId, ImageManager.ImageListCallback callback)
      Get all images for a specific event
      Parameters:
      eventId - The event ID
      callback - Callback with list of Image objects

    • deleteImage

      public void deleteImage(Image image, ImageManager.ImageDeleteCallback callback)
      Delete an image from Firestore
      Parameters:
      image - The Image object to delete
      callback - Callback indicating success or failure

    • deleteAllImagesForEvent

      public void deleteAllImagesForEvent(String eventId, ImageManager.ImageDeleteCallback callback)
      Delete all images for an event (used when an event is deleted)
      Parameters:
      eventId - The event ID
      callback - Callback indicating success or failure

    • getImagesByOrganizer

      public void getImagesByOrganizer(String organizerId, ImageManager.ImageListCallback callback)
      Get images uploaded by a specific organizer (useful for admin functionality)
      Parameters:
      organizerId - The organizer's user ID
      callback - Callback with list of Image objects
